title: Driving - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/8/20
itunes:title: Driving - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/8/20
description:
George Noory and mechanic Matthew Crawford discuss why driving cars remains so popular, the increased danger posed by driverless cars and distracted drivers, and how businesses like Uber have permanently changed the way we travel.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
